Description:
Verify that bookmarks are properly added to bookmarks file and appear
      in all access points.

Verify that bookmarks are properly deleted from bookmarks file and
      disappear from all access points.

Verify that items from the personal toolbar folder are properly
      added/deleted.
Verify new folder creation and nesting of new folders.

Verify that double-clicking on a bookmark causes it to be launched in
      a browser window

Verify that view properties works as appropriate for bookmarks,
      folders, and separators(negative)

Change the name of a bookmark without use of the bookmark properties
      dialog.
sort and reverse-sort per column
Verify that several bookmarks are deleted at one time.

Currently, it is my understanding that there will be no new features
      in this area

Determine whether non-copyable page content such as UI widgets are
      correctly omitted from the Clipboard content.

Determine whether HTML entities can be properly copied to other
      applications.

Verify that dragging an image across browser windows
      opens the image
Vrify that dragging an image onto the desktop saves the image

Verify that dragging onto a frame-set
      page loads the dragged content properly.

Determine if the Bookmark Manager properly handles
      items dragged onto it.

Verify that dragging a large (e.g. 5 MB) image across
      browser windows, to desktop, and into mail message
      works properly.

113893Implement New Form Functionality
      (waiting on bug status)

* Longer range:
      there is discussion about introducing Internet permission zones.
      Some of the settings shown here may be controlled by such zones
      (Waiting for Implementation)

Verify that you can stop a form's data from being saved from
      the popup dialog box, and you click no.

Verify that you can stop a form's data from being saved from
      the popup dialog box, and you click no.

Verify that you can save a form's data from the popup dialog
      box, never for this site and you are never asked again upon
      returning to the site.

Verify that when you encounter a Web site that could be prefilled
      and have several choices for fields that you are given the pre-fill
      dialog and can select from the appropriate values and the information
      is filled into the form.

Verify that if you enter data in the Form Manager and then
      click cancel, the data has not been saved

Verify that if you delete data in the Form Manager then
      click cancel, the data has not been deleted

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content. (Verify the content is in local
        documents)

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content.

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you
        can't sign on"

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problme "if you
        can't see anyone in your buddy list window."

Verify that minimization, maximize and close buttons of the toolbar
        invoke the correct behavior

Verify that page up and down, in fact, page up and down in
        help

Verify that you can hide the toolbar in help as well as reopen
        it

Verify that you can move around pages with the up and down arrow
        keys
Determine whether Help Contents displays correctly

Determine whether Instant Messenger help content displays
        correctly
Determine whether the Security Center displays correctly
Determine whether International Users displays correctly
Determine whether the Feedback Center displays correctly
Determine whether the About Netscape displays correctly

Determine that you can open all the selections in the Help drop
        down menu using short cut buttons.
Delete multiple History entries

Verify browser goes back and forward correctly from page with
        frames.

Verify that browser remembers scroll state when returning to pages
        in SH

Determine that large Images can be resized to the browser window
        and will not cause you to scroll in order to view entire image.

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        networked server.

Test applets within <embed>, <applet> and 
  <object> tags

Verify that the master password is visually distinctive from other
        password prompts (indicates the functionality and importance of the
        master password)

Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
      in the save password dialog box

Verify that when you have saved multiple username's and password's
      for a website, you are later presented with those same choices

Verify that when you have saved a username and password for a website
      and you later change the password, that password manager picks up the new
      password

Verify that when you enable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you are asked if you would like to save usernames and passwords
      and get prefilled info on sites

Verify that when you have saved a username and password in password
      manager, this information can be viewed in the password manager through
      preferences

Verify that when you have designated not to ever save a username and
      password in password manager, this information can be viewed in the
      password manager through preferences (expedia.com)

Verify that you can remove a username and password for a given site
      and it will no longer autofill on that sight nor will it be listed in
      password manager (espn.com)

Verify that you can remove all username and password information and
      it will no longer autofill nor will anything be listed in password
      manager

Feature: Preferences, passwords never saved, remove all
Description:
Verify that you can remove all site and username information from the
      passwords never saved section of password manager (ivillage.com)

Verify that when you have saved a username and password in password
      manager, this information can be viewed in the password manager through
      tasks

Verify that you can remove all username and password information and
      it will no longer autofill nor will anything be listed in password
      manager (lycos.com)
Print a test page and check to see if it prints properly

Determine if a page with aligned text prints as seen on
        screen
Determine if XML pages print properly
Determine if images print correctly
Determine if character styles print correctly
Determine that off-line printing works
Determine if flash movies play correctly.
Determine if Realaudio works properly
Determine if files with various sound formats play properly

Verify that clicking search button will search text entered in
      URLBar.
Verify that starting a URL bar search triggers the sidebar
Verify that a user can change the search engine
Determine whether the double-click gesture functions properly.
Determine whether the triple-click gesture functions properly.

Determine whether text from a JavaScript applet is properly
        selected in conjunction with other page content.
Check default width of Sidebar
Retaining non-default size on reopen or new window
Cursors should have the right icon when mousing over

Verify that panels appear highlighted when mouse is moved over
        them
Adding a already added panel
Verify that order and panel list is immediately applied
Verify that links in Bookmarks work

Verify that unselecting panels from Add menu removes panels from
        the Sidebar

After viewing a file/page or three, test URL
        autocompletion: test for current browser, new browser and new editor
        windows.
Open a nonexistent (bogus) web location.

Feature: Local file in current browser window
Description:
Open local files (both HTML and plain text tested) in the current
        Navigator window. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.

Use of the native Win32 file picker to navigate through directories
        and open files (html, plaintext, image). Cancellation also tested.

Feature: Basic find in page and frame content
Description:
Find in html page and html frame documents. Test Find Again and
        cancellation. Test for NOFRAME content.

Find forwards and backwards within a document. Test Find
        Again.
Viewing page and frame source via context menu.

Scrolling and keyboard navigation within the source window. Also
        should be able to use keyboard accelerators. Resize source window.

Verify the expected displayed color for content, tags/attributes,
        values, script code, entities, etc.
View info for a webpage, frame and frameset.
Verify if themes exist under View menu

Feature:
Verify all the selectable items on other applications under
        Classic theme
Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar and tool bars under AIM,
        Composer, Mail and Address book to see all the looks and feel are
        consistence under Classic theme

Feature:
Verify all the selectable items on other applications under
        Modern theme
Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar and tool bars under AIM,
        Composer, Mail and Address book to see all the looks and feel are
        consistence under Modern theme

The active window is visually distinct, inactive = grey title
        bar.
Click to maximize (expandto content on Mac)
Click up arrow to scroll page
Click and drag thumb to scroll page

Verify that toolbars can be dragged&dropped to change their
        order
Verify that each buttons executes as appropriate.
